page.shortlink: api inet namespace ssl socket class query tcp method
page.description: Returns .T. (TRUE) if the TCP connection described by the arguments matches an active connection.
page.prototype: Result_Flag as L = INET::SSLSocket::Query_TCP( LocalHost as C, LocalPort as N, RemoteHost as C, RemotePort as N, State as N )

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: LocalHost
argument.description: The URL of the local computer.

argument.name: LocalPort
argument.description: The port used on the local computer.

argument.name: RemoteHost
argument.description: The URL of the remote computer.

argument.name: RemotePort
argument.description: The port used on the remote computer.
